# Welcome!

This is a website that I (Peter Larsson-Green) use in my work at Jönköping University where I teach in various courses involving programming. Here I upload course material students can take part of in their studies. If you're curious, feel free to look around at the various courses and lectures.

# Acknowledgements ❤️

Thank you everyone that have contributed to the technologies making this website possible:

  • VuePress - The Static Site Generator this website is implemented in
  • Git - The Version Control System used to manage the source code
  • GitHub - The Software Development Platform hosting the source code for this website and the website itself
  • Visual Studio Code - The Code Editor I use

All of these technologies are available for free (to some extent), just as this website. Thank you!
